About Us

Investment Strategy

Diophantus invests in companies revolutionizing the Fintech sector using AI, Generative AI in all forms. We are an independent Venture Capital Firm leveraging our experience and networks to help create the next generation of incredible AI-empowered startups. As an early-stage investor, we typically invest $250,000 to $5MM into Seed and Series A rounds with opportunities to participate in follow-on rounds.
